name: Duck's Delivery
description:
Welcome driver, the year is 2752 A.C.

As you kown we are currently going through a financial crisis. In order to save or fuel, all spaceships have been instaled with a special device called a magneti gravity lock, M.G.L. for short

This device uses gravity to boost your ship and arrive at the destination inexpensively. Please do you best to use this device and keep fuel cost to a minimum.

Corporate thanks you for your service.

Duck's Deliveries
